name: Cosmic Squad
description:
Game play vedio

This is a 2D survival game where the longer you survive, the more points you get. You are the captain of an alien ship involved in interstellar development and you have discovered a brand new planet with valuable water resources. But this continent seems to have such unknown monsters. You need to dodge the monsters and props in the dark map and find the fire point to light up the map briefly for 10 seconds to get the survival space.

Use the left mouse to move, the right to hit the monster!
